alert.note: Alert for Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 12 at 3:29AM PDT until March 13 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to 6 to 12 inches, with local amounts to 15 inches. * WHERE...Stehekin, Holden Village, and Stevens Pass. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 11 PM PDT Monday. Heaviest snowfall amounts projected overnight into Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult with slippery road conditions. This could impact the Monday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
